title: Hillary Clinton Calls On Gun Owners To 'Take Back' Second Amendment From The NRA
text: While promoting her new proposals to limit the availability of firearms, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton suggested at a town hall in New Hampshire Monday that "responsible gun owners" should join together to create an
